reviews.review_msg: This professor is clear with expectations and fair. Exams are exactly what he presents in lecture. His approach always considers power dynamics and intersectionality. Balances theory and application well. He was also understanding when I went through personal difficulties and made accomodations for me.

Benjamin is very thorough in his lectures and reading materials. He's also super helpful with papers if you ask for anything, which is great! He's definitely passionate and knowledgable about what he's teaching.
